Resume.Address: Arikoy Sitesi Çiğdem Sokak, No. : 77, Zekeriyakoy
Resume.Qualification:
University of Istanbul/Department of Economics, Istanbul, Turkey Nov. 1992 to Nov. 1996 Research Assistant Studies focused on the links between financial And industrial investments in emerging And developed economies. Studies conducted at the University of Istanbul And the University of California at Berkeley, Berkeley, U.S.A.
University of California at Berkeley, Berkeley, U.S.A. Feb. 1996 to April 1996 Financial Accounting-Study Program :
concentration on collecting, accumulating, sorting financial information, And reporting financial statements.
Univ. of Istanbul/Institute of Social Sciences ( M.A. in Money And Banking ) 1992 to 1993 Concentration on International Banking, Financial Management, Asset-Liability Management, Monetary Policy, Decision Making, And Economics. Thesis on Crowding Out Effect. Average grade :
90.71%
University of Istanbul/Department of Economics ( B.A. in Economics ) 1988 to 1992
Kabatas Erkek Lisesi ( High School ) 1985 to 1988
PUBLICATIONS AND EXTRACURRICULAR ACTIVITIES Appeared several times as a commentator on economic issues on CNBC-e, CNBC, Bloomberg HT, NTV, CNN Turk, Al-Jazeera Turk, And RS FM. Worked as a columnist in the CFO World And BrandMap magazines. Published articles on Turkish And global economies in several newspapers And web sites.
LANGUAGE SKILLS Turkish ( native ) , English ( advanced ) , German ( intermediate ) .
Resume.Skills: restructuring, approach, financial reporting, accounting, scratch, insurance, cash flow, IFRS, growth, risks, investment banks, auditing, acquisition, due diligence, private equity, Foreign Trade, infrastructure, liability, credit risk management, merger And acquisition, cash management, profitability, valuations, profitability analysis, MIS, Corporate Marketing, processing, risk assessment, marketing strategist, Geneva, marketing research, Organized, coordinated, coordination, budgeting, building, project management
Resume.Experience:
Tamek Gıda ve Konsantre Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S., Financial Affairs January 2016 to February 2018 Chief Financial Officer Organized and coordinated the restructuring process of the financial affairs group as part of the restructuring process of the entire company. Managed fundamental change in the financial affairs group in coordination with the other departments of the company. Developed entirely new relationships with banks based on a renewed financial and risk management approach. Developed a financial reporting system in the accounting, finance and budgeting departments with the support of the IT department in order to measure monthly performance of the entire company for making critical strategic decisions. Built up the risk management function from scratch for the purpose of insuring receivables through receivable insurance companies and adopted new financial instruments to safely support the sales activities of the company. Monitored and managed the cash flow of the company through restructuring bank loans for financing working capital. Enabled the company produce IFRS based financial and managerial accounting reports in addition to Turkish GAAP based financial and managerial accounting reports.
Trimpeks İth. İhr. Tur. ve Tic. A.S., Financial Affairs, Istanbul, Turkey June 2015 to January 2016 Financial Consultant Assumed responsibility of building up a newly designed financial reporting system for the company. Worked closely with the board of directors in order to prepare the company to position itself for growth at a new threshold. Introduced a new risk management approach for the company to better manage market and receivable risks.
Eko Faktoring A.S., Financial Affairs and External Relations, Istanbul, Turkey March 2012 to October 2014 Chief Financial Officer Launched a restructuring project of the accounting, finance, and budgeting departments in order to prepare the company to meet the requirements of Capital Markets Board of Turkey and Banking Regulation and Supervision Agency for the purpose of penetrating capital markets. Established relationships with investment banks, rating agencies, and auditing companies to successfully manage a series of bond issuances and diversify the financing sources of Eko Faktoring. Finalized the process by adding a bond portfolio of TL190 million to the company's financing sources and established mutually beneficial relationships with investors. Monitored the liquidity levels and conditions of the bonds in the second-hand bond market and managed to keep the high liquidity conditions successfully by developing sustainable strategies for the existing and potential investors. Led the potential merger-and-acquisition-related due diligence processes with potential strategic partners and private equity firms in and out of Turkey after having completed the restructuring period of the accounting, finance, and budgeting functions.
Delta Petrol Urunleri Ticaret A.S., Financial Affairs Group, Istanbul, Turkey July 2004 to February 2012 Chief Financial Officer ( 2010-2012 ) Financial Affairs Group Manager ( 2007-2010 ) Foreign Trade Finance Manager ( 2004-2007 ) Managed the financial affairs group which consisted of accounting, finance, and budgeting departments in the headquarters of the Delta group of companies which operated both in Turkey and various regions. Participated in several business expansion projects to carry out financial structuring and fund raising functions through international and domestic financial institutions for new business lines. Managed a variety of loan facilities with several financial institutions such as foreign/domestic banks, the IFC, the EBRD, etc. on purpose of supporting the growing trade and infrastructure constructing related activities and investments of the group companies. Managed the utilization of a variety of financial products against risks associated with currencies, interest rates, asset-liability-related maturity mismatches, etc. Represented the financial affairs group in a number of credit risk management committees of the group companies to assess, monitor, and mitigate risk factors of various businesses. Managed a sizable merger and acquisition project management team in order to create the best possible synergy opportunities through a strategic partnership with a globally important player.
Beko Elektronik A.S., Finance Department, Istanbul, Turkey Dec. 2001 to July 2004 Financial Analyst Conducted daily foreign trade desk operations of the finance department. Designed and developed a financial reporting system on the following issues :
weekly overdue export receivables, monthly foreign trade-related cash management activities, monthly receivables maturity management, monthly and quarterly financial results ( to third party financial institutions such as Turk Eximbank and the IFC ) , monthly customer and product profitability analyses, monthly market valuations and industry analyses. Assumed responsibility for export-related receivables insurance through a number of financial institutions and products. Designed a customer and product profitability analysis reporting system as part of the MIS and budgeting processes. Participated in pre-acquisition negotiations between Beko and Grundig as a project team member in order to perform business and financial process analyses.
Osmanli Bankasi A.S., Head Office/Dept. of Corporate Marketing, Istanbul, Turkey Nov. 2000 to Dec. 2001 Corporate Marketing Account Officer Coordinated daily operations of branch offices on purpose of product pricing, credit application processing, cash management services, profitability analysis, risk assessment, control, and management. Functioned as a marketing strategist between the departments of the head office and the branch offices in order to set the marketing and distribution strategies of branch offices.
Turk Ekonomi Bankasi ( TEB ) A.S., Gayrettepe Branch, Istanbul, Turkey July 1998 to Nov. 2000 Corporate Marketing Analyst Assessed a diverse portfolio of companies from small to multinational sized in a variety of industries to process and prepare loan applications of companies with strict risk control and management principles. Assisted in developing effective solutions to improve performance and profitability through risk and profitability analyses, industry monitoring studies, and following regulatory developments.
Du Pont de Nemours International S.A. Nov. 1996 to June 1998 Marketing Researcher, European Headquarters, Geneva, Switzerland Designed and developed a marketing research plan under Geographical Expansion Project for a strategic business unit to assess opportunities for growth outside the core European countries focusing on Central and Eastern Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. Analyzed the business portfolio of the strategic business unit under a number of end-use industries to fit the business portfolio of the strategic business unit to a large number of industries. Assessed potential distributors and customers through desk research and negotiations. Recommended various business segments on the approaches to develop business for specific opportunities. Fulfilled
Resume.DetailResume:
ARDA TUNCA Address : Arikoy Sitesi Çiğdem Sokak, No. : 77 , Zekeriyakoy, Sariyer, Istanbul, Turkey Tel. : +90 533 353 89 06/E-mail : ardatunca71@yahoo.com Linkedin Profile : http://tr.linkedin.com/pub/arda-tunca/1b/12a/98
WORK EXPERIENCE
Tamek Gıda ve Konsantre Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S., Financial Affairs January 2016 to February 2018 Chief Financial Officer Organized and coordinated the restructuring process of the financial affairs group as part of the restructuring process of the entire company. Managed fundamental change in the financial affairs group in coordination with the other departments of the company. Developed entirely new relationships with banks based on a renewed financial and risk management approach. Developed a financial reporting system in the accounting, finance and budgeting departments with the support of the IT department in order to measure monthly performance of the entire company for making critical strategic decisions. Built up the risk management function from scratch for the purpose of insuring receivables through receivable insurance companies and adopted new financial instruments to safely support the sales activities of the company. Monitored and managed the cash flow of the company through restructuring bank loans for financing working capital. Enabled the company produce IFRS based financial and managerial accounting reports in addition to Turkish GAAP based financial and managerial accounting reports.
Trimpeks İth. İhr. Tur. ve Tic. A.S., Financial Affairs, Istanbul, Turkey June 2015 to January 2016 Financial Consultant Assumed responsibility of building up a newly designed financial reporting system for the company. Worked closely with the board of directors in order to prepare the company to position itself for growth at a new threshold. Introduced a new risk management approach for the company to better manage market and receivable risks.
Eko Faktoring A.S., Financial Affairs and External Relations, Istanbul, Turkey March 2012 to October 2014 Chief Financial Officer Launched a restructuring project of the accounting, finance, and budgeting departments in order to prepare the company to meet the requirements of Capital Markets Board of Turkey and Banking Regulation and Supervision Agency for the purpose of penetrating capital markets. Established relationships with investment banks, rating agencies, and auditing companies to successfully manage a series of bond issuances and diversify the financing sources of Eko Faktoring. Finalized the process by adding a bond portfolio of TL190 million to the company's financing sources and established mutually beneficial relationships with investors. Monitored the liquidity levels and conditions of the bonds in the second-hand bond market and managed to keep the high liquidity conditions successfully by developing sustainable strategies for the existing and potential investors. Led the potential merger-and-acquisition-related due diligence processes with potential strategic partners and private equity firms in and out of Turkey after having completed the restructuring period of the accounting, finance, and budgeting functions.
Delta Petrol Urunleri Ticaret A.S., Financial Affairs Group, Istanbul, Turkey July 2004 to February 2012 Chief Financial Officer ( 2010-2012 ) Financial Affairs Group Manager ( 2007-2010 ) Foreign Trade Finance Manager ( 2004-2007 ) Managed the financial affairs group which consisted of accounting, finance, and budgeting departments in the headquarters of the Delta group of companies which operated both in Turkey and various regions. Participated in several business expansion projects to carry out financial structuring and fund raising functions through international and domestic financial institutions for new business lines. Managed a variety of loan facilities with several financial institutions such as foreign/domestic banks, the IFC, the EBRD, etc. on purpose of supporting the growing trade and infrastructure constructing related activities and investments of the group companies. Managed the utilization of a variety of financial products against risks associated with currencies, interest rates, asset-liability-related maturity mismatches, etc. Represented the financial affairs group in a number of credit risk management committees of the group companies to assess, monitor, and mitigate risk factors of various businesses. Managed a sizable merger and acquisition project management team in order to create the best possible synergy opportunities through a strategic partnership with a globally important player.
Beko Elektronik A.S., Finance Department, Istanbul, Turkey Dec. 2001 to July 2004 Financial Analyst Conducted daily foreign trade desk operations of the finance department. Designed and developed a financial reporting system on the following issues : weekly overdue export receivables, monthly foreign trade-related cash management activities, monthly receivables maturity management, monthly and quarterly financial results ( to third party financial institutions such as Turk Eximbank and the IFC ) , monthly customer and product profitability analyses, monthly market valuations and industry analyses. Assumed responsibility for export-related receivables insurance through a number of financial institutions and products. Designed a customer and product profitability analysis reporting system as part of the MIS and budgeting processes. Participated in pre-acquisition negotiations between Beko and Grundig as a project team member in order to perform business and financial process analyses.
Osmanli Bankasi A.S., Head Office/Dept. of Corporate Marketing, Istanbul, Turkey Nov. 2000 to Dec. 2001 Corporate Marketing Account Officer Coordinated daily operations of branch offices on purpose of product pricing, credit application processing, cash management services, profitability analysis, risk assessment, control, and management. Functioned as a marketing strategist between the departments of the head office and the branch offices in order to set the marketing and distribution strategies of branch offices.
Turk Ekonomi Bankasi ( TEB ) A.S., Gayrettepe Branch, Istanbul, Turkey July 1998 to Nov. 2000 Corporate Marketing Analyst Assessed a diverse portfolio of companies from small to multinational sized in a variety of industries to process and prepare loan applications of companies with strict risk control and management principles. Assisted in developing effective solutions to improve performance and profitability through risk and profitability analyses, industry monitoring studies, and following regulatory developments.
Du Pont de Nemours International S.A. Nov. 1996 to June 1998 Marketing Researcher, European Headquarters, Geneva, Switzerland Designed and developed a marketing research plan under Geographical Expansion Project for a strategic business unit to assess opportunities for growth outside the core European countries focusing on Central and Eastern Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. Analyzed the business portfolio of the strategic business unit under a number of end-use industries to fit the business portfolio of the strategic business unit to a large number of industries. Assessed potential distributors and customers through desk research and negotiations. Recommended various business segments on the approaches to develop business for specific opportunities.
EDUCATION University of Istanbul/Department of Economics, Istanbul, Turkey Nov. 1992 to Nov. 1996 Research Assistant Studies focused on the links between financial and industrial investments in emerging and developed economies. Studies conducted at the University of Istanbul and the University of California at Berkeley, Berkeley, U.S.A.
University of California at Berkeley, Berkeley, U.S.A. Feb. 1996 to April 1996 Financial Accounting-Study Program : concentration on collecting, accumulating, sorting financial information, and reporting financial statements.
Univ. of Istanbul/Institute of Social Sciences ( M.A. in Money and Banking ) 1992 to 1993 Concentration on International Banking, Financial Management, Asset-Liability Management, Monetary Policy, Decision Making, and Economics. Thesis on Crowding Out Effect. Average grade : 90.71%
University of Istanbul/Department of Economics ( B.A. in Economics ) 1988 to 1992
Kabatas Erkek Lisesi ( High School ) 1985 to 1988
PUBLICATIONS AND EXTRACURRICULAR ACTIVITIES Appeared several times as a commentator on economic issues on CNBC-e, CNBC, Bloomberg HT, NTV, CNN Turk, Al-Jazeera Turk, and RS FM. Worked as a columnist in the CFO World and BrandMap magazines. Published articles on Turkish and global economies in several newspapers and web sites.
LANGUAGE SKILLS Turkish ( native ) , English ( advanced ) , German ( intermediate ) .
REFERENCES Available upon request.
PERSONAL INFORMATION Date of Birth : 14.08.1971 Place of Birth : Istanbul, Turkey Military Service : Fulfilled Memberships : Propeller Club, Association of Kabatas Erkek Lisesi Graduates, Association of Istanbul University Department of Economics Graduates, AIESEC, Enka Sport Club.

Managed a sizable merger and acquisition project management team in order to create the best possible synergy opportunities through a strategic partnership with a globally important player.

Beko Elektronik A.S., Finance Department, Istanbul, Turkey Dec. 2001 to July 2004 Financial Analyst Conducted daily foreign trade desk operations of the finance department. Designed and developed a financial reporting system on the following issues : weekly overdue export receivables, monthly foreign trade-related cash management activities, monthly receivables maturity management, monthly and quarterly financial results to third party financial institutions such as Turk Eximbank and the IFC , monthly customer and product profitability analyses, monthly market valuations and industry analyses. Assumed responsibility for export-related receivables insurance through a number of financial institutions and products. Designed a customer and product profitability analysis reporting system as part of the MIS and budgeting processes. Participated in pre-acquisition negotiations between Beko and Grundig as a project team member in order to perform business and financial process analyses.
SegExperience.Employer: Osmanli Bankasi A.S., Head Office/Dept. of Corporate
SegExperience.JobDescription: Osmanli Bankasi A.S., Head Office/Dept. of Corporate Marketing, Istanbul, Turkey Nov. 2000 to Dec. 2001 Corporate Marketing Account Officer Coordinated daily operations of branch offices on purpose of product pricing, credit application processing, cash management services, profitability analysis, risk assessment, control, and management. Functioned as a marketing strategist between the departments of the head office and the branch offices in order to set the marketing and distribution strategies of branch offices.

Turk Ekonomi Bankasi TEB A.S., Gayrettepe Branch, Istanbul, Turkey July 1998 to Nov. 2000 Corporate Marketing Analyst Assessed a diverse portfolio of companies from small to multinational sized in a variety of industries to process and prepare loan applications of companies with strict risk control and management principles. Assisted in developing effective solutions to improve performance and profitability through risk and profitability analyses, industry monitoring studies, and following regulatory developments.
SegExperience.Employer: Du Pont de Nemours International S.A
SegExperience.JobDescription:
Du Pont de Nemours International S.A. Nov. 1996 to June 1998 Marketing Researcher, European Headquarters, Geneva, Switzerland
Designed and developed a marketing research plan under Geographical Expansion Project for a strategic business unit to assess opportunities for growth outside the core European countries focusing on Central and Eastern Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. Analyzed the business portfolio of the strategic business unit under a number of end-use industries to fit the business portfolio of the strategic business unit to a large number of industries. Assessed potential distributors and customers through desk research and negotiations. Recommended various business segments on the approaches to develop business for specific opportunities.
Fulfilled

SegSkills.SoftSkills: Organized, coordinated, coordination, budgeting, building, project management

DenizBank A.Ş. ( 18.08.2015 - 18.09.2015 ) Staj
Kredi Tahsis
Transay Taşımacılık ( 03.04.2016-20.09.2016 ) Staj
Satınalma
Erdikler Bağımsız Denetim ve Ymm A.Ş ( 23.09.2016- )
Audit ( Bağımsız Denetim )
Eğitim : Lisans : İstanbul Bilgi Üniversitesi Uluslararası Ticaret Ve işletmecilik ( 2010-2015 ) Lise : Kemer Koleji ( 2006-2010 ) İlköğretim : İstek Vakfı ( 1998-2006 )
Katıldığım Eğitim ve Seminerler : İnovasyon ve Yaratıcılık Türkiye Vergilendirme Sistemi Vergi Şeffaflığı Sempozyumu MSGUT Eğitimi KGK'ya göre Bağımsız Denetimin Güvenilirliği BOBİ ve TFRS Semineri SPK Bilgi Sistemleri Yönetimi ve Bağımsız Denetim Düzenlemeleri Konferansı
Bilgisayar Bilgisi : Word - Excel - Powerpoint - Outlook : Çok iyi
Yabancı Dil : İngilizce Okuma : İyi - Yazma : İyi - Anlama : İyi Almanca Okuma : Başlangıç - Yazma : Başlangıç - Anlama : Başlangıç
Kişisel Özelliklerim :
Analitik düşünce yapısı ve olayları sentezleyerek çözüm üretme Girişken ve sosyal Çözüm odaklılık Araştırmacı ve yeniliklere açık
İlgi Alanlarım : Denetim Bağımsız Denetim İç Denetim Finansal Raporlama Ekonomi Finans Dış Ticaret
Kariyer Hedefim : Lisans eğitimim süresince edindiğim bilgi ve becerilerimi kurumsal ve özel firmalarda bilgi ve birikimle geliştirerek hizmet edeceğim kurumlara, edindiğim bilgi birikimi ile olumlu yönde katkılarda bulunup sektörel tüm süreçlerde söz sahibi olabilmek. Kısa vadede, eğitim ve kariyer geçmişime uygun bir kariyer fırsatı yakalamak. Uzun vadede, şirkete değer katarak üst yönetimlerde görev yapmak.
